statements: UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_url='http://example.com/page1', user_id=1001 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visit_timestamp='2022-01-15 08:30:00', device_type='Mobile' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET device_type = 'Mobile' WHERE user_id = 123 AND geography = 'US';
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_url = '/contact-us', visit_timestamp = '2022-05-20 15:30:00' WHERE id = 15;
UPDATE user_feedback SET rating = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visit_duration = 60, page_url = '/home' WHERE visitor_id = 100;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visit_duration = 120 WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND page_url = '/home'
UPDATE user_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great experience!' WHERE user_id = 50 AND rating = 5
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_visited = 'HomePage' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_details SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET user_id = 1001, page_visited = 'Home Page', visit_timestamp = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE user_id = 1002;
UPDATE content_engagement SET engagement_score = 9.5, time_spent = 1200, user_id = 2003 WHERE page_id = 101;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visit_timestamp = '2022-08-20 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE page_content_data SET content_title = 'New Content Title' WHERE page_url = 'example.com/page1';
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visitor_id = 1001 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE user_feedback_data SET feedback_text = 'Great service!' WHERE user_id = 2002;
UPDATE page_views SET time_spent_in_seconds = 60 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE visitor_data SET visitor_name = 'John Doe', visit_count = 5 WHERE id = 3
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET time_spent_in_seconds = 120 WHERE visitor_id = 1001;
UPDATE content_data SET views_count = views_count + 1, content_type = 'Article' WHERE page_url = '/blog-post';
